title: What are the payment options?
body:
You have two payment options:
1. Pay monthly for 6 months during your classes and placement, and receive a 40% discount.
2. Pay in installments only after you are placed in a job, but this option does not include the 40% discount.

title: Is your program online or in campus?
body: We offer both online and in-campus classes. You can choose the option that works best for you.

title: Will I get support after placement?
body: Yes, we provide support even after you are placed in a job. If you face any difficulties, our team is here to help you succeed.

title: What are the minimum qualifications to apply?
body:
The minimum qualifications to apply are:
1. Be at least 18 years old.
2. Authorized to work in the US.
3. Each student must have their own computer with the latest technology compatible.

title: What jobs does NOVA prepare applicants for?
body:
NOVA prepares applicants for various jobs including:
1. Application Developer
2. Software Developer
3. Software Engineer
4. Technical Consultant
5. Support Engineer
6. And more.
